property.name: eventTypeDefinitions
property.value: <event name="Data" package="com.industry.analytics"> <member name="name" type="string"/> <member name="type" type="string"/> <member name="sourceId" type="string"/> <member name="timestamp" type="float"/> <member name="fValue" type="float"/> <member name="sValue" type="string"/> <member name="params" wildcard="true" type="dictionary"> <key type="string"/> <item type="string"/> </member> </event>

property.name: mappingRules
property.value: <mapping:messageMapping xmlns:mapping="http://www.progress.com/caf/mapping1.0" xmlns:metadata="http://www.progress.com/caf/mapping1.0/toolingMetadata" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <condition xmlns="http://www.progress.com/1PAdapters/conditional/1.0" expression="${apamaEventType.name=='com.industry.analytics.Data'}"> <mapping:mapInput> <mapping:property name="eventType" value="com.industry.analytics.Data"/> <mapping:rule action="None" resource="" source="${apamaEvent}" target="${jms.body.textmessage}" type="BINDING_PARAM"/> <mapping:rule action="None" source="com.industry.analytics.Data" target="${jms.property['MESSAGE_TYPE']}" type="BINDING_PARAM"/> <mapping:rule action="None" resource="" source="queue:Data Simulator" target="${jms.header['JMSDestination']}" type="BINDING_PARAM"/> </mapping:mapInput> </condition> </mapping:messageMapping>
